title: Three member committee to probe petrol import; Payment for 20,000 tons of petrol suspended:
content: Petroleum Resources Minister Susil Premajayantha suspended payment for the 20,000 tons of petrol, reportedly of low quality. The minister has appointed a three member committee to investigate whether any fraud had taken place in the process of importing petrol.
